text: Nityanand Rai (born 1 January 1966) is an Indian politician. He is current Minister of State for Home Affairs in the Government of India. He was elected in the 2014 and 2019 General Election from Ujiarpur. He is a member of the Bharatiya Janata Party. He had continuously represented Hajipur constituency in Bihar legislative assembly winning elections since 2000 (2000, Feb-2005, October- 2005 and 2010). == References == == Notes == Category:1966 births Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians Category:Bihari politicians Category:Living people Category:Members of the Lok Sabha
title: Nityanand Rai
